item.title: Trying Databricks
item.description: https://databricks.com/try-databricks 2021-03-21 Running A quick start notebook Based on the notes here, it is pretty easy to create an auto-scaling cluster. Not sure yet what events prompt the cluster to get more workers. But I would be curious to try a job that uses fewer workers and more workers, to see how the outcomes compare. I also like ethat this notebook supports SQL and also python , using what looks like first line as %python to indicate the language.
